text: Timothy Floyd Burchett ( ; born August 25, 1964) is an American politician. He has been the U.S. representative for since 2019. He is a member of the Republican Party. Burchett was mayor of Knox County, Tennessee from 2010 to 2018. He is seen as a possible candidate for Governor of Tennessee in 2026. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Tim Burchett official U.S. House website *Tim Burchett for Congress * *Tim Burchett at Ballotpedia *Our Campaigns â€“ Mayor Tim Burchett (TN) profile *Tim Burchett State Senate profile * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Tennessee Category:Politicians from Knoxville, Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:American mayors
title: Tim Burchett
